DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effective dose(s) of RPC4046 in the treatment of Eosinophilic Esophagitis (EoE). This trial consists of two phases: 16 weeks of double-blind treatment and 52 weeks of open-label extension.
DOC.brief_title: Dose Ranging Study of RPC4046 in Eosinophilic Esophagitis
DOC.criteria: Histologic evidence of EoE Clinical symptoms of EoE including dysphagia Primary causes of esophageal eosinophilia other than EoE
